alert.note: Alert for Guilford (North Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued September 12 at 5:51PM EDT until September 12 at 6:30PM EDT by NWS Raleigh
info.description: The National Weather Service in Raleigh has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Central Guilford County in central North Carolina... * Until 630 PM EDT. * At 550 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Greensboro, moving northeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Greensboro, High Point, Summerfield, Stokesdale, Jamestown, Haw River State Park, Lake Townsend Marina, Lake Townsend, Lake Jeanette Marina and Monticello. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Prepare immediately for damaging winds and deadly cloud to ground lightning. Seek shelter inside a well-built structure. Stay away from windows.
